import "./App.css"; import "./java.js"; import axios from 'axios' function App() { return (
login(e)} id="Login" className="input-group">
); } function login(e){ e.preventDefault(); let request ={ email:document.getElementById('username').value, password:document.getElementById('password').value } axios.post('http://localhost:8080/login',request) .then(resp=>{ alert(resp.data.message); }) .catch(err=>{ console.log(err); }) } export default App;
